quote: The reason I talk to myself is that I'm the only one whose answers I accept.
name: George Carlin

quote: I am really looking forward as I get older and older, to being less and less nice.
name: Annette Bening

quote: The trouble with the rat race is that even if you win, you're still a rat.
name: Lily Tomlin

quote: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.
name: Lily Tomlin

quote: I can't prove it, but I can say it.
name: Stephen Colbert
Mark Twain
quote: Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company.
It is better to keep your mouth closed and let people think you are a fool than to open it and remove all doubt.
name: Mark Twain

quote: I think feminism is the worst thing that ever happened to women. Our job used to be no job. We had it so good!
name: Ali Wong

quote: The first time I see a jogger smiling, I'll consider it.
name: Joan Rivers

quote: I keep waiting to meet a man who has more balls than I do.
name: Salma Hayek

quote: I don't trust anyone that hasn't been to jail at least once in their life. You should have been, or something's the matter with you.
name: John Waters

quote: I believe that sex is one of the most beautiful, natural, wholesome things that money can buy.
name: Steve Martin

quote: The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age.
name: Lucille Ball

quote: The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four Americans is suffering from some form of mental illness. Think of your three best friends. If they're okay, then it's you."
name: Rita Mae Brown

quote: If you want to know what God thinks of money, look at the people he gave it to.
name: Dorothy Parker

quote: Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
name: Ernest Hemingway
